arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "select " +" T_ODR_CTL.\\"ODR_CTL_NO\\" as \\"ODR_CTL_NO\\" " +"from " +" T_ODR_CTL " +"where " +" T_ODR_CTL.\\"CUST_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ODR_CTL.\\"CUST_ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ODR_CTL.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ODR_CTL.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0"

"insert into " +" T_ODR(\\"ODR_NO\\", \\"ODR_TYP\\", \\"ODR_CTL_NO\\", \\"CUST_ODR_NO\\", \\"CUST_CHRG_ORG_CD\\", \\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\", \\"ODR_ACPT_ORG_CD\\", \\"ODR_ACPT_PSN_CD\\", \\"CURRNCY_CD\\", \\"EXCH_TYP\\", \\"DLV_LOC_CD\\", \\"DLV_LOC_NAME_KANJI\\", \\"ODR_UNIT_PRICE\\", \\"SPCL_PRICE_TYP\\", \\"SHIP_CNT\\", \\"DEPO_TYP\\", \\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\", \\"STD_DESINATED_RCV_DATE\\", \\"ODR_QTY\\", \\"REMAIN_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY\\", \\"CANCELED_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY\\", \\"UNIT_CD\\", \\"UNCONFIRM_ODR_BALANCE\\", \\"ODR_AMOUNT\\", \\"ODR_AMOUNT_EXCH_RATES\\", \\"ODR_CMPLT_FLG\\", \\"TRANSPORT_CD\\", \\"TRANSPORT_TYP\\", \\"TAX_APPLY_TYP\\", \\"TAX_CD\\", \\"TAX_CALC_TYP\\", \\"REMARKS\\", \\"ODR_ACPT_DATE\\", \\"SHIP_PLAN_REMAIN_QTY\\", \\"SHIP_PLAN_CMPLT_FLG\\", \\"UNCONFIRMED_ODR_EFF_OVR_FLG\\", \\"PARTIAL_SHIP_INST_FLG\\", \\"ENTRY_TYP\\", \\"DEL_FLG\\",\\"JOB_ODR_SET_FLG\\",\\"PART_NAME\\") " +"values " +" (?, to_number(?), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, to_number(?), ?, ?, to_number(?), to_number(?), 0, to_number(?), to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), to_number(?), to_number(?), 0, ?, to_number(?), to_number(?), to_number(?), 0, ?, to_number(?), to_number(?), ?, to_number(?), ?, to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), to_number(?), 0, 0, to_number(?), 2, 0,0,?)"

"insert into " +" T_ODR_ACPT_RSLT(\\"RSLT_CTL_SEQ_CD\\", \\"ODR_CTL_NO\\", \\"ODR_NO\\", \\"CUST_ODR_NO\\", \\"ODR_TYP\\", \\"CUST_CD\\", \\"CUST_ITEM_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\", \\"ODR_QTY\\", \\"UNIT\\", \\"DLV_PLACE_CD\\", \\"UNIT_PRICE\\", \\"CUR_CD\\", \\"SPCL_PRICE_CO\\", \\"DEPO_TYP\\", \\"CUST_DLV_CD\\", \\"CUST_DLV_KEY_CD\\", \\"REMARKS\\", \\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\", \\"ODR_ACPT_PSN_CD\\", \\"ODR_ACPT_DATE\\", \\"TAX_CD\\") " +"values " +" (to_number(?), ?, ?, ?, to_number(?), ?, ?, ?, to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), to_number(?), ?, ?, to_number(?), ?, ?, to_number(?), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), ?)"

"insert into " +" T_ANS_DLV_DATE(\\"ODR_NO\\", \\"PART_DLV_SEQ_NO\\", \\"LAST_ANS_DLV_DATE_RCD\\", \\"DESINATED_SHIP_DATE\\", \\"DESINATED_SHIP_QTY\\", \\"REST_SHIP_ODR_QTY\\", \\"SHIP_ODR_CMPLT_FLG\\", \\"IF_CTL_NO\\", \\"DEL_FLG\\") " +"values " +" (?, 1, to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), to_number(?), to_number(?), 0, 0, 0)"

"select " +" M_CUST.\\"CUST_NAME\\" as \\"CUST_NAME\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"OWN_ORG_CD\\" as \\"OWN_ORG_CD\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"OWN_PERSON_CD\\" as \\"OWN_PERSON_CD\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"CUR_CD\\" as \\"CUR_CD\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"EXCH_TYP\\" as \\"EXCH_TYP\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"TAX_APPLY_TYP\\" as \\"TAX_APPLY_TYP\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"TAX_CD\\" as \\"TAX_CD\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"TAX_CALC_TYP\\" as \\"TAX_CALC_TYP\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"DETAIL_ROUND_TYP\\" as \\"DETAIL_ROUND_TYP\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"PARTIAL_SHIP_INST_FLG\\" as \\"PARTIAL_SHIP_INST_FLG\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"DEPO_TYP\\" as \\"DEPO_TYP\\" " +"from " +" M_CUST " +"where " +" M_CUST.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CUST.\\"CUST_CD\\" = ? " +""

"select " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"DLV_LOC_CD\\" as \\"DLV_LOC_CD\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"DLV_LOC_NAME\\" as \\"DLV_LOC_NAME\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"TRANSPORT_CD\\" as \\"TRANSPORT_CD\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"TRANSPORT_LT\\" as \\"TRANSPORT_LT\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"TRANSPORT_TYP\\" as \\"TRANSPORT_TYP\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"DEPO_WH_CD\\" as \\"DEPO_WH_CD\\", " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"SHIP_WH_CD\\" as \\"SHIP_WH_CD\\", " +" M_WH.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"SHIP_PLANT_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_CUST_BASE, " +" M_WH " +"where " +" M_CUST_BASE.SHIP_WH_CD = M_WH.WH_CD " +" and M_CUST_BASE.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CUST_BASE.\\"CUST_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CUST_BASE.\\"DLV_LOC_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_UNIT_COST.\\"UNIT_COST\\" as \\"UNIT_COST\\" " +"from " +" M_UNIT_COST " +"where " +" M_UNIT_COST.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_UNIT_COST.\\"CUST_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_UNIT_COST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" <= ? " +"order by " +" M_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" desc"

"select " +" M_ITEM_SPEC.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM_SPEC.\\"CUST_ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"CUST_ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM_SPEC.\\"DEPO_TYP\\" as \\"DEPO_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM_SPEC.\\"TAX_CD\\" as \\"TAX_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM_SPEC " +"where " +" M_ITEM_SPEC.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_ITEM_SPEC.\\"CUST_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_ITEM_SPEC.\\"CUST_ITEM_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"CODE\\" as \\"CODE\\" " +"from " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE " +"where " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"SYS_CLASS\\" = 'SALES' " +" and SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"CLASS_CODE\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_NO\\" as \\"ODR_NO\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"CURRNCY_CD\\" as \\"CURRNCY_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_ODR.\\"ODR_UNIT_PRICE\\") as \\"ODR_UNIT_PRICE\\", " +" to_char(T_ODR.\\"REMAIN_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY\\") as \\"REMAIN_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY\\" " +"from " +" T_ODR, " +" T_ODR_CTL " +"where " +" T_ODR.ODR_CTL_NO = T_ODR_CTL.ODR_CTL_NO " +" and T_ODR.\\"ODR_TYP\\" = 2 " +" and T_ODR.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0 " +" and T_ODR.\\"REMAIN_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY\\" > 0 " +" and T_ODR_CTL.\\"CUST_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ODR_CTL.\\"CUST_ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +"order by " +" T_ODR.\\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_NO\\""
"SELECT " +" M_CAL_H.CAL_NO " +"FROM " +" M_PLANT, " +" M_CAL_H " +"WHERE " +" M_PLANT.PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND M_PLANT.CAL_NO = M_CAL_H.CAL_NO"

"SELECT " +" M_CAL.HOLIDAY_FLG " +"FROM " +" M_PLANT, " +" M_CAL " +"WHERE " +" M_PLANT.PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND M_PLANT.CAL_NO = M_CAL.CAL_NO " +" AND M_CAL.CAL_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" AND M_CAL.HOLIDAY_FLG = '1'"

"INSERT INTO " +" T_JOB_ODR(\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", \\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"JOB_ODR_TYP\\", \\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", \\"JOB_ODR_QTY\\", \\"ALC_GRP_CD\\", \\"JOB_ODR_STS_TYP\\", \\"JOB_ODR_EXP_TYP\\", \\"JOB_ODR_DEL_FLG\\") " +"VALUES " +" (?, TO_NUMBER('0'), ?, ?, TO_NUMBER('1'), TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), TO_NUMBER(?), ?, TO_NUMBER('2'), TO_NUMBER('1'), TO_NUMBER('0'))"

"select " +" M_ITEM_SPEC.TAX_CD " +"from " +" M_ITEM_SPEC " +"where " +" COMPANY_CD = ( " +" select " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +" from " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +" where " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM' " +" ) " +" and M_ITEM_SPEC.CUST_CD = ? " +" and M_ITEM_SPEC.CUST_ITEM_CD = ?"
